head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHUMSKER, BETTY M. (NEE CUTLER)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHUMSKER, BETTY M. (NEE CUTLER)

block.p: SHUMSKER-Betty M. (Nee Cutler) of Atlanta died Aug. 2. Wife of the late Jack Shumsker. Mother of Carol and Fred Abrams and Paul Shumsker. Sister of William Cutler. Grandmother of Suzan Schultz and Kenneth Abrams. Services in MA. on August 6. Memorial observance thru Sunday at the home of Paul Shumsker in Brooklyn.

SHUMSKER-Betty M. (Nee Cutler) of Atlanta died Aug. 2. Wife of the late Jack Shumsker. Mother of Carol and Fred Abrams and Paul Shumsker. Sister of William Cutler. Grandmother of Suzan Schultz and Kenneth Abrams. Services in MA. on August 6. Memorial observance thru Sunday at the home of Paul Shumsker in Brooklyn.
